website_summaries.verdict: The Sony MDR-1000X wireless headphones offer solid audio performance and noise cancellation, but the industry leader costs less.
pros: Powerful audio performance with rich lows and strong clarity in the highs
Can be used passively with included audio cable
Noise cancellation is independent of wireless functionality
cons: Noise cancellation is good, but not great
Included audio cable lacks inline remote

customer_reviews.title: Clear design fault with headband cracking
customer_reviews.text: It seems that reviews here and threads elsewhere frequently point to a common weakness where the headband cracks around the hinge after just 3 months usage. Clearly a serioys design or manufacturing problem. That aside, the sound quality, noise cancelling and general usability are second to none. Even used in unpowered mode via cable they still sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Mooo

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Oh dear, it was too good to last. I thought i'd avoided the fatal design flaw problem that all the other one-star reviewers have described, but after twelve months it was my turn. As I slipped on the headphones earlier this evening, one arm completely snapped off and is now dangling, useless. I reckon i can patch it up if I glue on a metal strut to hold everything together, but on 300 quids' worth of electronics I really shouldn't have to. Shame on you, Sony. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pair of cans. The best in my life.
customer_reviews.text: I waited with the review about 9 months to give proper feedback. Headphones are outstanding. Sound quality much better than competition (Bose because Beats are no a competition at all for them). Battery still outstanding despite very heavy use (over 8h per day at work), no problem with connectivity or sound quality. A bit weird NC but I cannot compare because these are my first NC headphones. Although NC does the job. Touch panel is very intuitive and easy to use. No problems at all with it even when I fall asleep in the plane. I would never chose any buttons over this touch panel to be honest. Quality is outstanding, and they look luxury. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gutted, my son took off his headphones to ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gutted, my son took off his headphones to fold into case - they snapped. Have been in contact with Sony - its been classed as physical damage - apparently this is not the serial numbers that will be replaced for free. Cost of repair - nearly £80... just can't justify that as I can't see how I can be sure that it won't happen again. My son has treated these with utmost care and is gutted.
customer_reviews.author: polky

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a long haul flight I had to Australia and wanted to block out as much cabin noise as possible. I can't recommend these highly enough. Great battery life Sound if fantastic Comfortable to wear for extended periods of time Carry case has everything you need
customer_reviews.author: Loui

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I have had my SONY MDR 1000X Wireless headphones for just over two years. Out of the blue just as I was about to put them on, the right had side plastic above the ear cup just snapped off. Poor workmanship for such an expensive piece of kit. I would have expected them to last much much longer than this, considering I have a very old pair of Seinheiser headphones that are still going. Its not like I did anything rough, just sat on my sofa, and then snap. broken. Poor workmanship from Sony this time around
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Very good but not the most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sound quality in these is better than any bluetooth headphones I've tested (although they still fall short of the quality you can get in wired ones). The connection has never been unstable, and the noise cancelling is good. Absolute game changer on airplanes. Only issue is that they aren't comfortable when worn for a long period of time, and they're a bit heavy and bulky compared to the Bose ones. That being said, I don't regret choosing these over the Bose headphones.
customer_reviews.author: R.K

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, albeit troubling durability
customer_reviews.text: I use my headphones a lot and they are really great - great sound, very impressive noise cancelling and comfortable. The only downside is I've read a lot of reviews stating the hinge that allows the headphones to fold up is prone to breaking so I've avoided folding them and they are used solely when I'm on my PC. I doubt I would carry them with me very often but I would rather not risk cracking the hinge so I don't feel like I have an option. For that reason I'm docking a star on an otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: George Wallington

customer_reviews.title: The best noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: These are very effective in a noisy environment. I have tried many different solutions for listening to radio podcasts at the gym, in the hope of muffling the constant loud gym music, and these are the best. I previously had the Bose QC25, but the noise isolation (passive) and noise cancellation (active) are better on the Sony. Other reviewers have said that the headband is liable to break, so I also bought the Amazon extra insurance for peace of mind. It puts up the price a bit but means I can return them within two years with no quibble if anything goes wrong. Altogether I'm very pleased (and so I should be at the price!).
customer_reviews.author: Graham Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Faulty and misdescribed Warehouse deal - poor show and rubbish product
customer_reviews.text: Bought on warehouse deal for £120 in v good condition. Stated in original packaging (they weren’t). Stated minor imperfections (they were scratched everywhere). No packaging at all, no instructions, no charging cable (standard micro USB) and the noise cancelling just didn’t worked - it whistled whenever turned on. So, beware if you’re buying the warehouse deal option. May be cheap, but they’re rotten. I’m sure the brand new ones and more than twice the price are fine, but can’t really comment.
customer_reviews.author: Allyjb

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I only give these a four star because the sound of these headphones are amazing and the noise cancelling is superb but there are two things wrong with them the first is the build quality they are very plastic and cheaply made and the second problem is when you walk around with these headphones on there is a clunky noise coming out of the right earcup.But if you just use these for sitting indoors or on a bus or train these are the best sounding Bluetooth noise cancelling headphones I've heard if not the best headphones full stop.
customer_reviews.author: mr m g knowles

customer_reviews.title: Good whilst they lasted
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic audio quality and noise cancelling functionality. Plastic build isn’t great considering the price (as many before have commented). Battery refused to recharge after 6 months so sent back - amazon gave a full refund so overall happy with the result. Will personally go for a more robustly built set of cans next time (eg qc35), although I accept there will be inferior sound output and NC... Really enjoyed them whilst they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Ojamuscle

customer_reviews.title: The best noise cancellation headphones I've come across to date.
customer_reviews.text: Far superior to the bose qc15/25 and 35 for noise cancellation, bose may have created the technology but Sony seem to have perfected it. I state this as when noise cancellation is activated you cannot hear anything from your environment. I appreciate your paying nearly 300 for a pair of headphones but these are a good pair especially with mobile connectivity features that work well without the echo on both ends of the call.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Crack in band
customer_reviews.text: Even after receiving a warranty replacement my second unit has also developed the same crack at the bottom part of the band that meets with the earphone. Not great considering this is a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones that really do cancel out the noise.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, so glad I bought them. The noise cancelling performance is brilliant & allows one to remain focussed on quiet study in a noisy environment. Blocks out all the domestic clatter - 5 kids, TV, laundry, - other people's music, dog barking & other conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Microchips

customer_reviews.title: Best in class - can confirm
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - these are top of their class for a reason! Best noise cancelling I have ever experienced did not give me that sense of 'pressure loss' or 'under water ear' and with clear notices when there was a battery level change to low - a good amount of backup battery level and the touch controls are great. These are SUPER COMFY
customer_reviews.author: Barons Banter

customer_reviews.title: Automatically power off after 5 minutes and this feature  can't be turned off
customer_reviews.text: Incredible headphones in every way, especially the touch-commands and ambient sound modes. The noise cancelling is unbelievable. Except that they will power off automatically every five minutes unless they are connected to bluetooth, a 'feature' which is impossible to turn off. This means that you can't use these in isolation unless you are carrying around a bluetooth device, with bluetooth on, and connected to the headphones at all times. Possibly the stupidest feature ever. Want to use these on a plane? Won't work because your phone has to be in airplane mode.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Marples

customer_reviews.title: In love with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2 years ago and I'm still in love with them. Fantastic sound quality, brutal noise cancellation (this is blessing when travelling in London's underground or by plane) and excellent battery duration. The only downside is that when used to make phone calls, the microphone will capture some of the noises surrounding you, so it's not great to make phone calls with them if you are in a noisy place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be warned....design fault (IMHO)
customer_reviews.text: There is IMHO a design fault. After relatively light use the head 'band' has snapped - I looked online and it seems this is a very common problem. If you are out of warranty Sony appear to not want to do anything except charge for a repair. Not good enough for a premium set of headphones!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Andrew Jonathon Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, the best NC headphones by far
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Spent a lot of time looking at reviews on youtube before deciding. I have previously had 2 pairs of Bose QC35 which I had to return due to poor BT connection (incapable of transmitting between pocket and ear sadly without constant stutters). These have very good BT connection, very good noise reduction, very comfortable to wear for long periods without sore hear / sweating, very good sound quality, very good controls. Love the 'cup the ear' action to pause music and allow voices to be amplified!!
customer_reviews.author: DrMagical

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones!
customer_reviews.text: The first one had a big issue with the sound and everytime I was turning on the headphones, it was doing an horrible strident noise. However Sony replaced it quite quickly and I'm not disappointed of the quality. The Noise cancelling feature is amazing, the sensor touch is working perfectly and the sound is very good (missing some bass though) Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound - neutral and not overloaded with bass. The noise cancelling works extremely well - so good on flights. They are very light too. Only one small negative - it's not easy to switch between devices/computers but that's not a huge problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: J Diddy

customer_reviews.title: The volume is easy to control by swiping up or down on one ...
customer_reviews.text: Sony MDR-1000X headphones are built extremely well. I have had no problems with initial connection or maintaining a Bluetooth connection. The volume is easy to control by swiping up or down on one earphone. However I do not think they play music loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: TooFar

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts ages and the noise cancelling beats bose
customer_reviews.text: Apprehensive after hearing the issues with headband breakage (Google it!) But these have been fine. Hands down look feel.and sound better than the Bose QC that every Tom dick and Harry are sporting. Can't recommend more. Was tempted by the new version but for £100 more to get the Google assistant and no other benefits these really are the far better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad that I bought this on Black Friday
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that I bought this on Black Friday! It is awesome and was a bargain! I used it on plane, train, bus and in office. On the plane I slept like a baby. I'm almost forgot to get off the train. On the bus I felt the resonance only, except when I was sitting under the speaker. I could hear the speaker. Touchpad is good, but sometimes it reacts when I take off from my head. Bluetooth connection is fast and stable. For Macbook pro connection you need to press for 5-7 seconds and it will be shown.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor Gazdag

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I ordered this and the Bose quiet comfort at the same time to choose the best one. I stuck with these. They fit better on my head. I found the noise cancelling better on this one. The sound quality is top.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound, excellent NC and great build quality.
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of detailed reviews all over the interweb that articulate the quality and performance of these headphones. All I will say is that they will not disappoint. My colleague has the Bose 35's and I find the sound and NC of the Sony has the edge, but it is marginal. I did try a pair of budget equivalents and whilst they are not 4 times better (as per price) they are worth the extra.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Can't imagine my life without them now. Only gripe is the sensors - when putting them on my head I accidentally tap the earpiece. Also I never factored in my make up smearing on the leather cushions (foundation). So it needs cleaning from to time.
customer_reviews.author: King Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Pleasure to your ears
customer_reviews.text: Best NC headphones. Soft wraps, so your ears will not notice that you're wearing them! So far - best relaxing headphones I've ever had. Also comes with good quality and length jack cable. But there is a big minus: you cannot plug it is to your PC\laptop\xbox\etc as a headphones+mirophone. Microphone does not work, so you can use them only as headphones.
customer_reviews.author: StasGrin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality audio + construction and superb utility!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for university work in a busy library but with their ambient modes, more than suitable for talking to those around you and still listening to your music or work! on the go they stay on very well and have had no issues toggling between active noise cancellation and ambient modes should it get too windy - causing a lot of noise as the microphones are picking up the audio. all in all an amazing set of headphones - wouldn't trade them for any others and give my open back HD598SE's a run for their money if they weren't obviously heavier due to the batteries and tech inside!
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product. linking it via Bluetooth is a doddle
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product. linking it via Bluetooth is a doddle, whilst the functions are intuitive and work well. I'd certainly recommend this product ... oh, and the sound is brilliant, as well as the external noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough warranty
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is incredible, features are great and the noise cancelling is superb but they broke after 18 months usage in the same way as the others that have left reviews - a crack to the left side band, hasn’t affected usage too badly but I expect more from this brand and price. 1 year warranty so the device is out of warranty now, Sony admitted there is a build issue generally but wouldn’t replace them due to being out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rolison

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - shame the bracket breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a present a few years back. Lovely headphones but after a while there were cracks in the headband just about where the ear cups join the headband. A quick search shows this has been a common fault with Sony not repairing the fault even under warranty as they say it’s user wear and strain. Seems odd that so many people suffer from exactly the same issue. My bose qc35 still going strong and we’re purchased on the same day as these Sony headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Mccormack

customer_reviews.title: A truly excellent set of headphones that performs as described
customer_reviews.text: A truly excellent set of headphones that performs as described. The noise cancelling mechanism is probably the best there is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael John Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the gym to drown out the awful techno rubbish they play there, An amazing set of cans,great noise cancelling and touch control,sold my Bose headphones for these and have no regrets,superb, they do get too sweaty on the treadmill,but great for weights or x trainer workouts,
customer_reviews.author: cardiff blue

customer_reviews.title: Breaks quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after only a year of light use The volume and the play pause control now seems to be stuck down so tracks skip every few seconds and the volume goes up and down at random. Very poor build quality. Pay hundreds of pounds and you get a product that is basically disposable.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. These headphones bring you in your own world ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. These headphones bring you in your own world when you have them on it’s like everything around you completely disappears! Recommend to anyone who has to work on computers for long hours
customer_reviews.author: Soaad

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but excellent product. Clever touchpad control. Noise cancelling makes annoying children and other travel noises a thing of the past. Also a clever feature where you just touch the touchpad and the music stops and it opens external microphone so you can discuss your "chicken or beef?" option with the stewardess instantly. Sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Reid

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in November already broken. I cannot charge them or switch them on. Other people had the same issue read the internet before buying them
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Really work - make train journeys a private experience
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as an alternative to Bose (refunded due to bluetooth issues). Excellent sound, the bluetooth works, and the noise cancelling is very effective - although I perceive faint hiss if there is no music playing. I find them a touch tight - adjustable tension would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Matthew D. Black

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price & highly-rated
customer_reviews.text: MDR-1000Xs should have more established rivals sweating – on both sound quality and noise-killing efficacy, these cans are superb. Best wireless noise cancelling headphones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaking headband ,stay away from them !
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product even at discounted price!They function great as NC Bluetooth Headphones no doubt,except for one single "niggle",most of them tend to break on the left side of the headband.Mine just did that 2-3 months after purchase.For me its obvious it's a design flaw!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best for noise cancellation. Bit worried about the potential for the headband to crack near the ear but so far no cracks in the last 3 months of daily use. Not good in windy situations and a little bulky for me, so only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones out there
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I've ever made. Sound quality is out of this world, even with bluetooth. I feel awful when I listen to something with earphones now, as it sounds bad in comparison to Sony MDR-1000X. The noise-cancelling works perfectly too.
customer_reviews.author: Faris

customer_reviews.title: Simply Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones indeed. Excellent sound quality and superb noise cancelling. I have had Sony in ear noise cancellers and sony on ear cancellers but these are far better.
customer_reviews.author: Hubertus Jacobus van Hensbergen

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bose QC35's
customer_reviews.text: In love with these headphones so far - NC works a charm, ambient sound mode and quick listen is wonderful, super coumfy and look really sleek. Will keep an eye out for the dreaded crack but for now - I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dorn

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality of the headphones is very good, and the noise reduction effect is also very ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of the headphones is very good, and the noise reduction effect is also very good. The disadvantage is that it is easy to break. And I sent emails to contact customer service nobody answered.
customer_reviews.author: sl Derek

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound. Great feature set. Quite simply these are worth every penny. Great service from Amazon too...bluetooth connectivity seems rock solid. Sound quality excellent. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: KDJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality touch feature headphones. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones. Touch feature is a bonus. Fit is comfy and hugs head/ears well. Used mostly when travelling. Sturdy, quality product and handy carrycase which protects.
customer_reviews.author: StillWalking

customer_reviews.title: Great sound & features. Not as comfy as Bose.
customer_reviews.text: Great advanced NC features. Sound fantastic. Good noise-cancelling on flights. Tight headband gets tiring and stressful after an hour of wear. Not as comfy as my old Bose QC-15's
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, touch control on right ear cup. Love the plain but high quality design. Hard case for protection. Place hand over right ear to cut out music and hear your surroundings. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: When you take these things off, the world sounds mediocre! I cannot remember hearing better sound quality. The only thing they don't cancel the noise of is a Belfast Metro bus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling is great, sound and comfort are great
customer_reviews.text: Noise canceling is great, sound and comfort are great, however mine was faulty- had a rattling in the left ear. Sony was unable to repair it so they replaced it with a newer model. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lashi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones, they bluetooth to my iPhone with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones, they bluetooth to my iPhone with no problem at all. Can't wait to use them on my next flight; no more listening to screaming kids.
customer_reviews.author: D. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Material issue
customer_reviews.text: The head-band plastic and metal started to separate after half a year, I contacted Sony support, they said it's due to external damage. I'm not moving these outside the office, so they are as well-protected as they can be.
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent headphones; superb noise cancelling, excellent ambient sound control for voice/normal, lovely build quality; and when used as a headset (i.e. for phone calls, using the built-in mics) the call quality is excellent at both ends (confirmed with participants on the other end of the line)
customer_reviews.author: Mondraggor

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to it’s what hi fi review, comfortable, great sound and good noise cancellation
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Eyed these up for months along with the Bose qc 35's and took the plunge at the reduced price.Couldnt be happier,amazing crisp sound quality that edges the Bose and noise cancelling that is certainly on par with them.
customer_reviews.author: Blacker's

customer_reviews.title: There nothing to say I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing when somebody calls me I gotta scream they wont hear me microphone is very weak. I've bought the older version but they said that it will be fixed in new. Overall experience? absolutely satisfied it does what it supposed to do i haven't any issues with product since I bought that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Deq

customer_reviews.title: Faulty mini-jack
customer_reviews.text: If you're only using it for Bluetooth then should be OK but the first I tried to connect the mini-jack on an aeroplane it turned out to be faulty and now I'm faced with a Sony repair process. If you but them check the mini-jack early.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ooooh yes!
customer_reviews.text: You've read all the reviews, and they're right. These are fantastic - great sound, and extraordinary insulation from all the rumble, chatter and other people's phone calls on the train.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Excellent noise cancelling - you can hear ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Excellent noise cancelling - you can hear some noise as you would want to for safety (not whilst playing music at a reasonable level)
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones I had.
customer_reviews.text: The active noise cancelling is very impressive. When the headphones power on all ambient noises suddenly disappear. Also the 1000X is very comfortable to wear - I use these during work (I'm a programmer and I cherish isolation while working).
customer_reviews.author: Efstathios Dimopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Developed a squeak after a while.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones developed an intermittent physical squeak after a while. Any movement would cause it. Tried to send them away for warranty repair but they said I would be charged if they couldn’t find the fault, so I’m kinda stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mono

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love these, absolutely outstanding sound and great noise cancelling. The newer version maybe better but these are cheaper and I doubt if I would notice too much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Badger47

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, I use them on my flights. Finger gesture to change tracks and pause are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Wildman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I am very much impressed with battery backup. I loved smart features which are very useful on everyday basis. Sound quality is really really nice. Noise cancelling works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: santosh

customer_reviews.title: Right Earphone Loss in Volume
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these headphones now. Both times the right earphone has failed slightly so the sound output is noticeably quieter than the left. I believe this is a product flaw. I would not recommend these over the Bose alternatives for a similar price. If you do purchase these, make sure you get them insured.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Twyman

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly good
customer_reviews.text: They're loud but nice loud which does not hurt your ears, nfc makes it easy to connect Bought them for 190 and can't complain good price However the controls are confusing
customer_reviews.author: Franky

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have ever made, I can drift into my own world wherever I want
customer_reviews.author: Ross N

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional headphones
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt my best purchase on amazon. Used daily for the gym, for travel, for music and for PlayStation. Exceptional quality and durability
customer_reviews.author: Gazza

customer_reviews.title: The plastic snapped on the right side.
customer_reviews.text: They are excellent quality when it comes to the sound quality and noise reduction , but the plastic snapped on the right arm. I'm going to send it to be repaired, but I did't expect them to break so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru Ghitulescu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to hold
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable package of tech at this price, a top drawer product from a well known market leader. Awesome to hold, even better to listen to.
customer_reviews.author: S_york

customer_reviews.title: ANC
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, ANC working very well, great product overall. Love it issuing it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Bankyboy

customer_reviews.title: These are great and ideal with hearing aids - so comfortable with ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great and ideal with hearing aids - so comfortable with the option to hear the outside world or not.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. A. Armour

customer_reviews.title: Would love another pair.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product but I lost them on a flight. Very sad after that!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lennon

customer_reviews.title: which means that taking a plane is going to be excellent. Very comfy to wear even with glasses on
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth work well, the noise cancelling is top notch. I work in a kitchen with a very strong and noisy extraction fan and i can't hear it at all with these headphones, which means that taking a plane is going to be excellent. Very comfy to wear even with glasses on.
customer_reviews.author: maximilien renaudin

customer_reviews.title: boy am a happy man these headphones are a dream to use well ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently sold my Bose qc25 headphones , I was on the lookout for a new pair and considered Bose qc 35 , I then read reviews on the Sony MDR 1000x , and purchased , boy am a happy man these headphones are a dream to use well made . 100 % happy .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic qualify set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for someone else. Fantastic qualify set. Noise reduction is incredible and they are very confortable.
customer_reviews.author: S. K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best travel companions. Its will make you forget about the rest...
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Love em..
customer_reviews.text: I love these, noise cancelling works well, sound quality is good
customer_reviews.author: A J Turrall

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Another great product. Battery seems to last forever making you think something is wrong! :) good quality sound and connects so easily
customer_reviews.author: cajani

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as a Christmas present and she loved them and wears them all the time
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas present and she loved them and wears them all the time, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sub

customer_reviews.title: Very poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor build quality - Like other people the plastic cracked within a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones! The noise cancelling and sound quality are excellent and they look great too
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headphones in general
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headphones in general. However the charging connector " C" type is very small and a pain to connect to charge. I think Sennheiser have the better solution with a charging stand
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are my favorate over the last six months. Better than Beats Studio Wireless and Bose 35 BT, Great sound and greatest noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Selwyn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Broken head band bracket, these are not designed to last.
customer_reviews.author: Robertg

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever owned. Great battery life, great sound, great fit. Just brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound, easy to use controls. Did a lot of research before deciding on these.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: 6 months after buying I'm still loving them. Best noise cancelling in the market at the moment
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound n quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound (shame I left them on a plane and never got them back :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, great noise cancelling. Touch controls take some getting used to. They were an absolute bargain during black friday as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Zero flaws
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly good headphones. The sound quality is incredible and the battery life is also excellent. I’ve these more than a year now and have not found a flaw yet.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Very good noise cancellation on them and look very cool
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Newey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good audio and doesn't crack sounds on max volume. However, my ears does hurt after using straight for about 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Millet

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic noise cancelling headphones....great sound....comfortable and in my opinion better than the bose alternatives
customer_reviews.author: paul b

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding headphones. The best I’ve owned in 30 years. Really good well controlled sound with great range, fantastic noise cancelling, very comfortable and long battery live. Very good price vs. this year’s updated version
customer_reviews.author: HUW C WATKINS

customer_reviews.title: *% - it's awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best headphones I have ever tried! Everywhere I tested them, films, games, music, wireless and wired - it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever owned. The controls are quick to learn, the functionality is fantastic, the sound quality is really good. Solid noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: SomethingMeaTy

product_meta.title: Sony MDR-1000X Wireless Bluetooth Noise Cancelling Ambient Sound Touch Sensor High Resolution Audio Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackSony MDR-1000X Bluetooth Noise Cancelling Ambient Sound Touch Sensor High Resolution Audio Headphones - Black.

BOX CONTAINS
MDR1000X
Carrying Case
Plug Adaptor for In-flight Use
Connection Cable
USB Cable
Warranty Card
Operating Instructions
feature_bullets: Noise cancelling with reduced ambient noise for perfect silence
Comfortable around ear fitting with 20 hour battery life
Smart technologies: Ambient sound mode, Touch Sensor operation, Quick Attention mode
First ever DSEE HX headphones upscaling your existing music to near high-resolution audio quality
Carrying case included. Driver unit: 3.98 cm, dome type (CCAW voice coil)

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
